dataset_id: Global Gridded Surfaces of Selected Soil Characteristics (IGBP-DIS)
title: Global Gridded Surfaces of Selected Soil Characteristics (IGBP-DIS)
summary: Global data-surfaces pre-generated by  SoilData, at a resolution of 5x5 arc-minutes, in ASCII GRID format for ARC INFO, and for the soil depth interval 0-100 cm.
